text: The National Ground is a cricket ground in Islamabad, Pakistan. The first recorded match on the ground was in the 2009/10 season. The ground has hosted thirty first-class matches since 2009. It was selected as a venue to host matches in the 2016–17 Regional One Day Cup. ==See also== * List of cricket grounds in Pakistan ==References== ==External links== *National Ground at CricketArchive Category:Cricket grounds in Pakistan Category:2009 establishments in Pakistan
title: National Ground
